resources.string: This app Is a simple Treasury Bill Calculator that calculates future interest payment for investment amounts
Please input only digits or periods as needed. Do not input any letters, percentages or monetary symbols. E.g: 11.5% should be put in as 11.5 or 11.50

This Treasury Bill Calculator can currently be used only for the Nigerian and Ghanaian financial markets. It is not a representation of solicitation for any financial institution, but a calculation of a future interest on the Treasury Bill capital investment. We are not responsible for any financial overture from the use of this app.
